0x7E8EBFE5.name: GET_CONVAR_BOOL

params.name: varName
params.description: The console variable to look up.

params.name: defaultValue
params.description: The default value to set if none is found.

0x7E8EBFE5.description: Can be used to get a console variable casted back to `bool`.

examples.code:
if GetConvarBool('dev_mode', false) then
    print("Dev Mode is eanbled, load dev mode menus")
end

0x7E8EBFE5.resultsDescription: Returns the convar value if it can be found, otherwise it returns the assigned `default`.
